channel.title: Milano air pollution related to COVID on Milano Pollution related to COVID
channel.description: Recent content in Milano air pollution related to COVID on Milano Pollution related to COVID

item.title: Dataset
item.description: The dataset we have decided to analyse collects data relating to the measurements of air pollutants in the municipality of Milan.

item.title: Explanatory analysis
item.description: Genre Our visualization blends elements of the slide show narrative visualization and of the annotated charts. The plots are structured according to a consistent visual style, for example with the color blue identifying the average from the years previous to 2020.

item.title: Maps and stations
item.description: Station measurements over time displayed on Milano’s Map for each pollutant
